sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {ChakraProvider, Box, Flex, Text, Container, Stack, Spacer } from '@chakra-ui/react'

const Menu = () => {
    const sticky = {
        position: "-webkit-sticky", /* Safari */
        position: "sticky",
        top: "0"
    };

    return (
        <ChakraProvider>
            <Box w="300px" h="100vh" style={sticky}>
                <Stack direction="column" spacing="35px">
                    <Box h="35px" bg="blue.500" ></Box>
                    <Box h="35px" bg="blue.500" ></Box>
                    <Box h="35px" bg="blue.500" ></Box>
                    <Box h="35px" bg="blue.500" ></Box>
                    <Box h="35px" bg="blue.500" ></Box>
                    <Box h="35px" bg="blue.500" ></Box>
                    <Box h="35px" bg="blue.500" ></Box>
                    <Box h="35px" bg="blue.500" ></Box>
                    <Box h="35px" bg="blue.500" ></Box>
                    <Box h="50px" bg="blue.500" ></Box>
                    <Box>
                        <Box h="40px" bg="blue.500" mt="240px">
                            <Stack direction="row">
                                <Box></Box>
                                <Box>
                                    <Stack direction="row" spacing="80px">
                                        <Box>
                                            <Stack direction="column" spacing="-10px">
                                                <Text>MK Rabbani</Text>
                                                <Text>@mkrabbani97</Text>
                                            </Stack>
                                        </Box>
                                        <Spacer />
                                        <Box>
                                            <Box w="17px" h="5px" bg="tomato" mt="15px"/>
                                        </Box>
                                    </Stack>
                                </Box>
                            </Stack>
                        </Box>
                    </Box>
                </Stack>
            </Box>
        </ChakraProvider>
    )
}

export default Menu
